string.description.discord.command.unban: Unbans the user from your current server.
string.discord.command.unban.success.embedbody: The user, **${user}**, has been unbanned from **${guild}** for **${reason}.
string.discord.command.unban.error.unspecifiedu: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
string.discord.command.unban.error.problemoccur: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.unban.error.ratelimit: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.unban.error.alreadyunban: That user has either already been unbanned, or hasn't been banned whatsoever!
string.discord.command.unban.error.botmissingre: I am missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can unban said person.
string.discord.command.unban.error.usermissingr: You are missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can unban that person.
